# <a name="saving-messages-in-outlookcom"></a><span data-ttu-id="e28a4-102">在 Outlook.com 中儲存的郵件</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e28a4-102">Saving messages in Outlook.com</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e28a4-103">您無法將電子郵件訊息儲存 Outlook.com，但您可以將其列印為 PDF 您可儲存您的電腦上。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e28a4-103">You cannot save email messages in Outlook.com, but you can print them to a PDF which you can save on your PC.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e28a4-104">在 Windows 10 中包含以 PDF Microsoft 列印公用程式可讓您列印直接以 pdf 格式的任何電子郵件訊息。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e28a4-104">The Microsoft Print To PDF utility included in Windows 10 allows you to print any email message directly to a PDF.</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="e28a4-105">選取您想要儲存的郵件。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e28a4-105">Select the message you want to save.</span></span>
2. <span data-ttu-id="e28a4-106">選取三個點</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e28a4-106">Select the three dots</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' />
 <span data-ttu-id="e28a4-107">頂端的郵件，然後選取 [</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e28a4-107">at the top of the message and then select</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' />
 <span data-ttu-id="e28a4-108">**列印**。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e28a4-108">**Print**.</span></span>
3. <span data-ttu-id="e28a4-109">同樣地，選取 [**列印**]，然後從印表機] 下拉式清單功能表中，選取 [ **Microsoft 列印為 PDF**。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e28a4-109">Select **Print** again, and from the printer drop-down menu, select **Microsoft Print to PDF**.</span></span>
4. <span data-ttu-id="e28a4-110">選取 [**列印**]。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e28a4-110">Select **Print**.</span></span>
5. <span data-ttu-id="e28a4-111">輸入檔案名稱，然後選取 [**儲存**]。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e28a4-111">Enter a file name then select **Save**.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e28a4-112">**附註：** 建議您不要共用或公用電腦上為其他使用者仍可存取您儲存到電腦並不要刪除任何 Pdf。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e28a4-112">**Note:** This is not recommended on shared or public computers as other users could have access to any PDFs you save to the PC and don't delete.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e28a4-113">如需列印的詳細資訊，請參閱[列印電子郵件訊息、 附件，並在 Outlook.com 中的行事曆](https://support.office.com/article/c835b8e5-b310-4cab-ac15-b6eb95149855?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e28a4-113">For more information about printing, see [Print email messages, attachments, and calendars in Outlook.com](https://support.office.com/article/c835b8e5-b310-4cab-ac15-b6eb95149855?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy).</span></span>
